## Toast.createDom() method

Creates the DOM representation of a toast.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected static createDom(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, options: ToastOptions): HTMLDivElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace to inject the toast notification onto. |
|  options | [ToastOptions](./blockly.toastoptions.md) | Configuration options for the toast. |

**Returns:**

HTMLDivElement

The root DOM element of the toast.
